page.title: 02Much Wenlock Primary School.
page.content: The present{Much Wenlock Primary {School}was opened in{1974,}on the outskirts of the town, on the{A458, the main road to{Bridgnorth.}The school has{186}pupils,{1}headteacher, {6}full time teachers,{2}part-time teachers and{1}ancillary helper. There are{6 bases}with approximately {30 children}in each base, a{G.P. room which is used for music, television programmes and other activities,{a {hall,}a{dining room,}a{staff room}and {two offices.}There is a{kitchen}where the school meals are cooked. The school is an{open-plan building with windows on all sides. The school building surrounds a small quadrangle which at present contains some plants and flowers. Outside the school are two playgrounds and a large playing field where various games are played.
